item.title: 华尔街三大股指收盘上涨，原因是经济数据和美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的言论强化了美国央行今年将降低基准利率的预期：
item.description:
Wall Street's three major indexes closed higher as economic data and comments from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell reinforced expectations that the US central bank would reduce its benchmark interest rate this year.
Read more: https://t.co/Jq9gq8fEun pic.twitter.com/FEmwG6hFdN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 特斯拉表示，它将退出澳大利亚主要的汽车游说团体，并辞去董事会职务，指责该团体在政府提出的燃油效率标准及其对汽车价格的潜在影响方面误导消费者。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Tesla said it is quitting Australia's major auto lobby and resigning from its board, accusing the group of misleading consumers over the government's proposed fuel efficiency standards and the potential impact on car prices. More here: https://t.co/hN2aaaDGa3

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 中国 1 月至 2 月的进出口增长超过预期，表明全球贸易正在出现转机，这对努力支撑经济复苏乏力的决策者来说是一个令人鼓舞的信号。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
China's export and import growth in the January-February period beat forecasts, suggesting global trade is turning a corner in an encouraging signal for policymakers as they try to shore up a stuttering economic recovery. More here: https://t.co/5rcNGh9CSz

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 观看：从埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）与 OpenAI 的分歧，到英伟达（Nvidia）老板的一个重要电话，这就是人工智能时代。
item.description:
WATCH: From Elon Musk and OpenAI at odds, to a big call by Nvidia’s boss, this is Generation AI pic.twitter.com/9ieu3T6X0R

item.title: 波音公司向美国监管机构提供了其 737 MAX 机门团队员工的姓名，此前立法者和一位联邦安全官员在参议院听证会上尖锐批评了该飞机制造商未能提供这些姓名。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Boeing provided US regulators with the names of employees on its 737 MAX door team after lawmakers and a federal safety official sharply criticized the planemaker's failure to do so at a Senate hearing. More here: https://t.co/Sy1iX2Kfj8

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 华尔街三大股指收盘上涨，此前美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，他预计央行将在今年降息，但他没有承诺降息时间表：
item.description:
Wall Street's three major indexes closed higher, after US Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said he expected the central bank to cut rates this year, although he shied away from committing to a timetable.
Read more: https://t.co/Jq9gq8fEun pic.twitter.com/UivSu3VTOv

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔表示，今年晚些时候降息 "很可能是合适的"，但他警告说，"不能保证在降低通胀方面继续取得进展：
item.description:
US Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said that interest rate reductions will ‘likely be appropriate’ later this year, but cautioned that continued progress on lowering inflation ‘is not assured.’
More here: https://t.co/TnspmlKw3B pic.twitter.com/ZexZJwxtFm

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 观看：从埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和 OpenAI 将在法庭上会面，到英伟达（Nvidia）老板黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）称机器人将能与人类无异，我们将为您盘点本周人工智能革命的重大新闻。
item.description:
WATCH: From why Elon Musk and OpenAI are set to meet in court, to when Nvidia boss Jensen Huang says bots will be able to pass as human, we round up the week's big stories from the AI revolution pic.twitter.com/s5jLnqcWzh

item.title: 美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，"如果经济发展大致符合预期，"今年晚些时候 "可能会适当 "降息，但他警告说，"不能保证在降低通胀方面继续取得进展：
item.description:
US Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said that rate reductions will ‘likely be appropriate’ later this year ‘if the economy evolves broadly as expected,’ but warned that continued progress on lowering inflation ‘is not assured.’
More here: https://t.co/TnspmlKw3B pic.twitter.com/3T2Uv0AuQF

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 中国在线零售商的季度收入超过预期，达到 425.2 亿美元，略高于分析师的预测。大幅降价有助于恢复消费者对不确定经济的需求
item.description:
Chinese online retailer https://t.co/LOi8NHnjTY beat quarterly revenue estimates as it reported a revenue of $42.52 billion — just ahead of analyst projections. Aggressive price cuts helped revive demand from consumers dealing with an uncertain economy https://t.co/VFbDzWwWbG pic.twitter.com/ACC118qhLi

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024
